Unveiling the Truth Behind Lara Trader's Forex Trading ..."}, {'url': 'https://www.reddit.com/r/Forex/comments/1ac97id/warning_lara_trader_youtuber_one_of_the_biggest/', 'content': 'Beware of Lara Trader, a big scammer who runs a VIP group for online trading. She claims to provide signals for 1-minute candles, but she always gives them 20 seconds late, which makes it impossible to profit from them. She only profits from her own right entries, while we suffer losses.'}, {'url': 'https://malwaretips.com/blogs/laura-canada-90-off-sale-scams/', 'content': 'Ad promotes deals like "Laura Canada Closet Cleanout - Handbags 90% Off!". Uses enticing slogans like "Warehouse Sale" or "Store Closing Sale". Shows $250 handbags discounted to $29.99 in the imagery. Has disabled or fake comments to hide warnings about the scam. Uses a recently created Facebook page with a generic name.'}, {'url': 'https://www.scamvoid.net/', 'content': 'Find a list of most viewed website reports of this month.
